Row.Text: Mythic Beast
{1_Help}
{1_Desc}
What nonsense!
The practice of head binding has become common in the {2_CivDesc}.
We have outlawed the practice of head binding in the {2_CivDesc}.
Steppe horsemen have rallied to the war banner of {3_PlayerDesc}.
Head Binding

Members of the nobility have begun to practice head binding. This is to wrap tight cloths around the heads of newborns, so as to re-shape their skulls into unnatural forms. This practice is quickly becoming a sign of membership to the upper strata.
Interesting. We endorse this custom.
Disgusting. We forbid this practice.
The practice of head binding has become common throughout the {2_CivDesc}.
We have outlawed the practice of head binding throughout the {2_CivDesc}.
Huaca
Our priests wish to commemorate a new Huaca - a holy site. They have asked us to endorse this by providing the necessary funds.
Yes, we shall fund this Huaca ourselves.
No, they must fund this Huaca themselves.
We have no time for this superstition.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on the Shrine in this city.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on the Shrine in this city.
No effect.
A new Huaca has been commemorated at {2_CityDesc}.
A new Huaca has been commemorated at {2_CityDesc}.
Great Migration
A great period of migration has begun, with people from across the land making the long journey to settle within our borders.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population in all cities.
A great Bantu migration has begun toward the {2_CivDesc}.
Religious Leader

A new religious leader has begun to attract followers to a divergent sect. There are those that are concerned that this leader could upset the fragile peace that exists between the city's religious minorities.
Have them cease their teachings at once.
Their teachings could advance our own faith.
Receive an Inquisitor.
Receive a Missionary.
The career of a religious leader has been ended in {2_CityDesc}.
The career of a religious leader has been embraced in {2_CityDesc}.
Charity
The city's new religious leader has encouraged charity in the people.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Religious Leader
The city's new religious leader has encouraged dissent in the people.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{3_Num} [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment.
Religious Leader
The city's new religious leader has encouraged a strong work ethic in the people.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Dynastic Marriage
A blushing bride from {1_CityStateName} has been wed to one of our cousins, bringing into closer union our two nations. Let us hope for many years of harmony between us!
A glorious celebration for our families!
A day for all to celebrate!
+25 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this City-State.[ENDCOLOR]
All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 2 turns and +10 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with this City-State.
Philosophical Debate

Two eminent philosophers have launched a public debate against one another. The topic at hand is {1_Philosophy}. Although amicable, their debate is beginning to upset our... less sophisticated citizens, and we must therefore step in.
on the morality of war
on the duties of government
on the divisibility of sovereignty
on the cuddliness of kittens
on the existence of existence
on just economics
on the interpretation of colours
on the nature of man
on choice
on the prevarication of moddability
on the wealth of beggars
on the interpretation of coughing
on the spirit of law
on the state of nature
on the sexiest world leader
on the rights of the indigenous
on the banality of evil
on the nutrition of dust
on depressive realism
"on the use of non-violence
Clearly, we must favour the realist argument.
We must concede to the subjectivist position.
Send the guards in and we'll show them the pragmatist approach!
[COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City must have a garrison in order to take this Event Choice.[ENDCOLOR]
The City begins celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 2 turns.
A philosophical debate has been settled in {2_CityDesc}.
A philosophical debate has been settled in {2_CityDesc}.
A philosophical debate has been settled in {2_CityDesc}.
Independance Day

Independence Day celebrations have begun. On this day, we celebrate our long history of self-determination and sovereignty.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 3 turns.
Holy Synod
A holy synod has been called together between the pious men of the nation. They propose that matters of state and law be discussed and their ruling be conferred to us as counsel.[NEWLINE]
We will not allow this.
Very well. We shall support this synod.
We have disbarred a holy synod from forming.
We have permitted a holy synod to form.
Trade Rights
Our lucrative goods and shrewd merchants have managed to secure for us an exclusive trade deal with a foreign merchant. We should make the most of this opportunity.
These could be sold for the right price.
Send our best merchants to take advantage of them.
Receive a Great Merchant.
Our exclusive trading rights have been sold.
Our merchants have been sent to a foreign land.
Jaguar Spotted
Scouts report that a ferocious jaguar has been spotted at the outskirts of the city. Jaguars are dangerous animals, and are known to kill people that transgress upon their territory.
Leave it be. It has harmed no one.
Send out the guard to kill it.
I will hunt the beast myself.
The City begins celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 2 turns.
A jaguar continues to prowl the outskirts of {2_CityDesc}.
A jaguar prowling the outskirts of {2_CityDesc} has been killed.
We have embarked upon the hunt for a jaguar spotted at the outskirts of {2_CityDesc}.
Jaguar Hunt
Failure! The jaguar prowling the outskirts of the City has evaded our hunt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{1_Num}.
Jaguar Spotted
As it turns out, the jaguar spotted at the outskirts of the City has become a popular attraction.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
Jaguar Spotted
The jaguar prowling the outskirts of the City has reportedly killed a number of children in recent months. We can no longer ignore the need to remove it.
We can sedate and re-locate it.
We have re-located the jaguar that had been prowling the outskirts of {2_CityDesc}.
Jaguar Hunt
Success! We have captured and killed the tiger prowling the outskirts of the city![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
White Elephant
We've managed to acquire a White Elephant for ourselves. This is, of course, a very auspicious omen for the nation.
We shall house it at our Palace!
Sell the wretched thing.
Receive a [ICON_RES_JFD_WHITE_ELEPHANT] White Elephant.
A White Elephant has been housed at our Palace.
We have sold our White Elephant.
White Elephant
Our White Elephant appears content with its life at our Palace.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
White Elephant
No doubt with thanks to our White Elephant, it has been an auspicious year for us![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+{2_Num}.
White Elephant
Our White Elephant is not content with its life in captivity. It seems bored and refuses to eat. If we do nothing, it may become a harm to itself or to others.
It longs for reverence. Build a shrine in its honour!
It longs for comfort. We must expand the city's Stables.
It is too expensive.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on the Palace.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on the city's Stables.
No effect.
We have honoured our White Elephant with a Shrine at the {1_CityDesc} Palace.
We have expanded {1_CityDesc}'s Stables in order to house our White Elephant.
War Captives
In our ongoing war, we have exacted many captives. So many, in fact, that we can no longer keep them as mere prisoners. We must therefore decide their fate.
We shall sacrifice them in the name of our Gods.
We shall send them to hard labour in our capital.
We shall execute them, to inspire loyalty in our soldiers.
+{2_Num} in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.
All Military Units are healed for 40 HP.
Our war captives have been sacrificed.
Our war captives have been send to hard labour.
Our war captives have been executed.
Hundreds of {1_Adjective} war captives have been sacrificed to the {2_Adjective} Gods.
Hundreds of {1_Adjective} war captives have been sent to hard labour in the {2_Adjective} capital.
Hundreds of {1_Adjective} war captives have been executed by the {2_Adjective} army.
Ceremonial Burial
The city's {1_RulerDesc} has passed from this world into the next. It has befallen us to oversee their burial.
They shall have a modest burial.
They must have a lavish burial.
They shall have no funeral at our expense.
{1_Num} and +{2_Num}.
{1_Num} and the City's Monument gains +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
No effect.
The governor of {2_CityDesc} has been given a modest burial.
The governor of {2_CityDesc} has been given a lavish burial.
The governor of {2_CityDesc} has been denied support for their burial.
Midsummer's Day
The summer solstice has begun and so with it has begun the Midsummer's Day celebrations. Bonfires shall be lit throughout the nation, and there will be plenty of food and drink for all.
Let us join in the festivities!
Let us contribute a bit to the festivities!
Let us contribute a lot to the festivities!
All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 3 turns.
{1_Num} and all cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 6 turns.
{1_Num} and all cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 12 turns.
The Midsummer's Day celebrations have begun throughout the nation.
The Midsummer's Day celebrations have begun throughout the nation.
The Midsummer's Day celebrations have begun throughout the nation.
Taboo Shellfish
Fishermen have discovered that the City sits near a valueable source of shellfish. However, this particular shellfish is also considered taboo - sacred - by the City's religious.
The shellfish must remain untouched.
The shellfish must be sold by the City's merchants.
The shellfish must be sanctified by the City's priests.
Resets the city's [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance Sentiment.
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on [ICON_RES_PEARLS] Pearls worked by this city.
The taboo shellfish discovered at {2_CityDesc} has remained neither sold nor sanctified.
The taboo shellfish discovered at {2_CityDesc} has been sold.
The taboo shellfish discovered at {2_CityDesc} has been sanctified.
Wayfinding
We have awoken suddenly to the sound of the tide crashing against our ears. The ocean glistens in the moonlight and a new home beckons us beyond the waves.
Just a dream... zzzzzzz...
It is a premonition. Our dream will guide us to new lands.
No effect.
{1_Num} and receive a free Settler.
Our dream will guide us to new lands.
Warrior's Service
A wayward warrior has arrived at our court, offering his services to us. The warrior is ragged and unkempt, but adorned with many scars. It is clear they have seen many battles.
Turn the wretch away! We have need of only respected warriors.
Have them cleaned and suited for armour.
Confiscate what estate they have and execute them!
Receive a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great General.
A wayward warrior has left our court in search of another lord to whom to pledge their service.
A wayward warrior has been recruited into our service.
A wayward warrior has been executed and their estate confiscated.
Masterpiece
To honour a prosperous year, we have been tasked with the patronage of a masterpiece. But of what kind?
Art to clarify the soul.
Music to tame the heart.
Writing to arouse the mind.
No art. Let us keep the gold.
{1_Num}, and receive +{2_Num} and a Great Artist.
{1_Num}, and receive +{2_Num} and a Great Musician.
{1_Num}, and receive +{2_Num} and a Great Writer.
No effect.
A Great Artist has been commissoned to honour the year's prosperity.
A Great Musician has been commissoned to honour the year's prosperity.
A Great Writer has been commissoned to honour the year's prosperity.
Circumpolar Council
The great peoples of the cold regions have come together to discuss matters concerning all. They have invited us to speak on behalf of our people, and to serve in their interest.
Naturally, We must take part.
We are a unique people. We reject this council.
All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 3 turns.
We have agreed to take part in the Circumpolar Council.
We have declined to take part in the Circumpolar Council.
Ceremony
The time has come for our nation to host a ceremony. But what sort of ceremony remains to be decided.
We shall host a corroboree to honour the ancestral creators.
We shall host a kulaw gudpuday to honour the recently departed.
We shall host a sing-sing to celebrate peace among our people.
All cities begin celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 3 turns.
Celebrations begin in honour of the ancestral creators.
Celebrations begin in honour of the recently departed.
Celebrations begin in honour of peace amongst our people.
Chosen People
A divine voice has elected of a land that we are destined to settle. We, as chosen people, must oblige.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Receive two free Settlers.
Political Philosopher
A political philosopher, well-known for their realpolitik dicourse, has arrived at our court. They ask for a position, but perhaps their works are too radical for us.
Send them and their ideas away.
We welcome them as a writer.
We would appreciate their counsel.
Recieve a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writer.
Recieve a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Magistrate.
A political philosopher has been turned away from our court.
A political philosopher has been accepted at our court as a writer.
A political philosopher has been accepted at our court as an advisor.
Rallying Horde

In this time of war, our nomadic brethren have rallied to our banner and to our cause; to join us in glorious onslaught of the enemy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Receive two [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses and two Keshiks.
Steppe horsemen have rallied to our war banner.
Steppe horsemen have rallied to the war banner of {3_PlayerDesc}.
Celebrations For Our Glorious Leader
Spontaneously, and absolutely without duress, our soliders have begun celebrating their love for their Glorious Leader - you!
I'm positively flattered!
Not good enough! Execute someone!
The city begins celebrating [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] 'We Love the King Day' for 2 turns.
The city loses 1 [ICON_CITIZEN] Population and its [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment is reset.
A military parade is being held in {2_CityDesc}.
Irreverents in {2_CityDesc} have been put to death.
War Chief
A vision of the Great Spirit has befallen one of our tribesmen. With this vision, a great war chief has been elected to lead us to military triumph.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Receive a free Great General.
Foreign Dignitary
A dignitary from a foreign land has come to our court, bearing one of three gifts: his service, his slaves, or his gold.
We shall have the dignitary.
We shall take the slaves.
We shall acquiesce the gold.
Receive 2 [ICON_JFD_DIGNITARY] Dignitaries.
Receive 20 [ICON_JFD_SHACKLES] Shackles.
A foreign ruler has gifted their dignitary to us.
A foreign ruler has gifted slaves to us.
A foreign dignitary has gifted gold to us.
A wealthy entrepreneur has donated to us a large sum of gold, hoping to support our nation's imperial ambitions.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Receive {2_Num}.
